title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Participatory Design and Co-Design Capability Strengthening Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners draft language education scenarios incorporating stakeholder requirements through three or more collaborative design sessions
Learners produce two prototypes reflecting language learners' cultural backgrounds using Design Thinking methodologies
Learners share real-time collaborative design experiences and collect feedback using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Miro, Figma)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
